item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 3rd July
item.description:
There are 3 blocked drains outside the properly -circled in image. They are full of rubbish and debris and they fill up when it rains and customer is concerned about his property flooding, as they are at a low point. Customer has tried to clear them out but it is solid. Please can they be cleared, thanks.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wall is falling to pieces - cars crashing and getting scratched, 3rd July
item.description:
The wall at the bottom of the road where cars have to reverse into to turn around is falling to bits. Everyday a car crashes into it or gets scratched or stuck. I suggest it gets taken down to be honest and replaced with softer/ rubber barrier or nothing at all. The falling rubble from it is also dangerous to animals and pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Stoneville Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Fences & Barriers problem, 3rd July
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLEASE BRING X6 BARRIERS AND 12 SANDBAGS PLACE NEXT TO WALL AND X1 NEXT TO STEP TO MAKE SAFE (Safety Fence Damage)
Report on FixMyStreet
